about_the_game:
For the crime of cheese theft, Piper the mouse has been imprisoned in the highest tower of the Rats' castle. These Rats wield the power of "Rules", mighty scrolls that grant the holder commanding power.
Piper 'borrows' a Rules Scroll, escaping their cell and ready to face the Castle's many traps and puzzles. The descent will be tricky, but with the power of Rules, perhaps Piper can just squeak through! 🐁💨

SET RULES TO CONTROL CASTLE AND CRITTER ALIKE! 📜

Rules grant you power over your environment and enemies. Abuse the heck out of this to solve puzzles! 🧩 Grab scrolls to unlock new Rule powers! Combine different Rules to discover hidden interactions! Rats always follow the Rules... now go and mess with them!! 🐀

DODGE TRICKY TRAPS AND MAKE CHEDDAR! 🧀

Elite Rat architects have crafted 30+ rooms of insidious puzzles. 🏰 Solve them to escape, and grab all the cheese you can along the way! Unlock the latest Mouse Fashions by completing your cheese collection! 🧥

I'M A LOVER, NOT A FIGHTER! 🤎

No attacks? No problem! Use your wits to overcome bosses by manipulating their arena with Rules! Solve puzzles on the fly in a deadly game of rat and mouse! 💥

Rules & Rodents is a text-free game where communication is visual. We hope people of all languages will enjoy it!
Originally created for and voted #1 in the Unity Create with Code 2 Game Jam, Gravy Crew is delighted to present this full, expanded version of Rules & Rodents! 📜🐀
